data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to assign records in.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationDescription
data.value: Assign Dynamics 365 records to a user or team

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity containing records to assign.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationOwnerTypeDescription
data.value: The type of owner to assign records to.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record that is being assigned.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the Target ID is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationTeamDescription
data.value: The team to assign as the record owner.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationUserDescription
data.value: The user to assign as the record owner.

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationValidateTeam
data.value: Please select a Team to assign records to

data.name: Dynamics365AssignOperationValidateUser
data.value: Please select a User to assign records to

data.name: Dynamics365AssociateOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 connection to associated records in.

data.name: Dynamics365AssociateOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source containing records to be associated.

data.name: Dynamics365AssociateOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity containing records to associate.

data.name: Dynamics365AssociateOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record that is being associated.

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionDescription
data.value: Provides connectivity to Dynamics 365 Online or on-premise

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionHomeRealmUrlDescription
data.value: The Internet Facing Deployment home realm Url. eg. https://server-1.server.com/adfs/services/trust/mex/.

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionPasswordDescription
data.value: The login password. The password is stored in an encrypted format.

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionProxyNotReady
data.value: A Dynamics organisation service proxy could not be created: {0}

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionServerUrlDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 server URL. eg. https://mysite.crm6.dynamics.com/

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionValidateServerUrl
data.value: Please enter the connection Organisation Service URL

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionValidateTimeout
data.value: The connection Timeout must be greater than zero

data.name: Dynamics365ConnectionValidateUserName
data.value: Please enter the connection User Name

data.name: Dynamics365CreateOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to create records in.

data.name: Dynamics365CreateOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365CreateOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to create records in.

data.name: Dynamics365CreateOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The identifier of the record to create.

data.name: Dynamics365CreateOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365DataSourceValueDestinationFieldDescription
data.value: The field to store the data source value in.

data.name: Dynamics365DeactivateProcessesOperationDescription
data.value: Deactivates one or more Dynamics 365 processes

data.name: Dynamics365DeleteOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to delete records from.

data.name: Dynamics365DeleteOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The records to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365DeleteOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to delete records from.

data.name: Dynamics365DeleteOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The identifier of the record to create.

data.name: Dynamics365DeleteOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a Lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365DisassociateOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 connection to disassociated records in.

data.name: Dynamics365DisassociateOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source containing records to be disassociated.

data.name: Dynamics365DisassociateOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity containing records to disassociate.

data.name: Dynamics365DisassociateOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record that is being disassociated.

data.name: Dynamics365DisassociateOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a Lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365ExportSolutionOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to export a solution from.

data.name: Dynamics365ExportSolutionOperationDescription
data.value: Export a Dynamics 365 solution to a file.

data.name: Dynamics365ExportSolutionOperationIsManagedDescription
data.value: If True, exports the solution as a managed solution, otherwise exports the solution as an unmanaged solution.

data.name: Dynamics365ExportSolutionOperationOpenFolderNotFound
data.value: The folder {0} could not be found

data.name: Dynamics365FieldOperationDuplicateDetectionDescription
data.value: If True, will apply duplicate detection rules. If False, will ignore duplicate detection rules.

data.name: Dynamics365FieldOperationGenerateMappingsToolTip
data.value: Automatically generates mappings between Data Source and Entity fields

data.name: Dynamics365FieldOperationValidateValuesDuplicate
data.value: Multiple values have been provided for {0}. Please ensure only one value is provided for each destination field.

data.name: Dynamics365LookupValueDestinationFieldDescription
data.value: The field to set with the looked-up value.

data.name: Dynamics365OperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to apply the operation to.

data.name: Dynamics365PublishAllOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to publish all customisations in.

data.name: Dynamics365PublishEntityOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to publish entity customisations in.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationBatchSizeDescription
data.value: The number of records that will be processed per request to Dynamics 365. Individual records are processed more slowly and reliably than records processed in a batch.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationContinuteOnErrorDescription
data.value: Determines whether subsequent operations are processed if an error occurs.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 entity to apply the operation to.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationExecuteBatchErrors
data.value: {0} error(s) occured when executing {1} requests including: {2}

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record targeted by the operation.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the Target ID is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationThreadCountDescription
data.value: The number of threads to use when writing to Dynamics 365. The order of writing data to Dynamics 365 is only guaranteed for single-threaded operations. A Microsoft support call is required to increase the maximum number of concurrent threads to greater than two for Dynamics 365 Online.

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationValidateBatchSize
data.value: Please set the Batch Size to a number between {0} and {1}

data.name: Dynamics365RecordOperationValidateThreadCount
data.value: Please set the Thread Count to a number between {0} and {1}

data.name: Dynamics365RelationshipOperationAssociatedSourceDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record in the associated entity.

data.name: Dynamics365RelationshipOperationAssociatedTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record in the associated entity.

data.name: Dynamics365RelationshipOperationRelationshipDescription
data.value: The relationship that associates the primary and associated entities.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to run workflows in.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationDescription
data.value: Run an on-demand workflow on a Dynamics 365 record

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to run the workflow against.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The identifier of the record to run the workflow against.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationValidateWorkflow
data.value: Please select a Workflow to run

data.name: Dynamics365RunWorkflowOperationWorkflowDescription
data.value: The activated, on-demand workflow to run.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to set the state of records in.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationDescription
data.value: Activate, deactivate or set the state of Dynamics 365 records

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to set the state of records in.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationFriendlyName
data.value: Set the state of {0} to {1} and {2}

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationRemarksDescription
data.value: The remark description to be included on the case close activity record.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationRequestDescription
data.value: Setting the state of {0} {1} to {2} and {3}

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationResolutionDescription
data.value: The resolution to be included on the case close activity record.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationStateDescription
data.value: The state to set the record to.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationStatusDescription
data.value: The status reason to set the record to.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The GUID of the record to set the state of.

data.name: Dynamics365SetStateOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a Lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365UpdateOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to update records in.

data.name: Dynamics365UpdateOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365UpdateOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to update records in.

data.name: Dynamics365UpdateOperationTargetDescription
data.value: The identifier of the record to update.

data.name: Dynamics365UpdateOperationTargetSourceDescription
data.value: Determines whether the identifier of the target record is sourced from a data source (DataSourceValue), a Lookup to another data source (LookupValue), a user-provided value (UserProvidedValue) or none (None). None should only be used for Create operations.

data.name: Dynamics365UpsertOperationConnectionDescription
data.value: The Dynamics 365 organisation to upsert records in.

data.name: Dynamics365UpsertOperationDataSourceDescription
data.value: The data source to read records from.

data.name: Dynamics365UpsertOperationEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to upsert records in.

data.value: The key values that are used to identify the target record.

data.value: Please add at least one Key Value

data.name: Dynamics365UpsertOperationValuesDescription
data.value: The record values to create or update.

data.name: Dynamics365UserProvidedValueDestinationFieldDescription
data.value: The field to set with the user-provided value.

data.name: Dynamics365ViewDataSourceDescription
data.value: Retrieves records from a Dynamics 365 system or personal view

data.name: Dynamics365ViewDataSourceEntityDescription
data.value: The entity to retrieve system or personal views from.

data.name: Dynamics365ViewDataSourceViewDescription
data.value: The view to retrieve data from.

data.name: Dynamics365ViewDataSourceViewTypeDescription
data.value: Indicates whether data will be retrieved from a system or personal view.
